title: line_item
name: line_item
description: A line item for a document

position.description: Position by which the items are sorted. Two items can have the same position(if you dont care) and numbers dont need to continuous

type.description: The item type: LineItem. Must be set when creating new items via document.items array

external_ref.description: Arbitrary number e.g. external product reference.

price_single.description: Net price of a single item. If a product id is given, price_single is taken from the product if not set.

cost.description: Cost price for a single item. Used to calculate the gross margin

cost_total.description: Total costs. Calculated from cost_single * quantity

gross_margin_total.description: Gross margin, the difference between revenue and cost before accounting for certain other costs. Calculated from net_total - cost_total

gross_margin_pct.description: Gross margin percentage. Calculated from gross_margin_total/cost_total

net_total.description: Net price of a single item. Calculated from price_single * quantity * discount

gross_total.description: Gross price. Net total with taxes applied.

tax.description: Tax percent for a single item.

discount.description: Discount in percent applied to the items net total. Can also be negative if you want to add additional charges.

quantity.description: Quantity of the item. Must be >= 0

product_id.description: A uuid of a product, used by this item. If set or changed, the product fields (name, description, quantity, unit, price, cost price) are copied if the according item fields are missing/blank. Besides this product link makes it possible to track a products turnover and find the documents it is used on.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

_destroy.description: When set an existing item will be deleted. This switch is used for items passed-in nested inside their parent object(a document), which is default as long as there is no line item endpoint available.
